div.pre: 753 Trojanovo, c. 40 km. S of Stara Za- gora, Bulgaria, 1961 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 552 AR. Pot hoard Thracian Chersonese: 441 hemidr. Parium: 111 hemidr. Disposition: Stara Zagora Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 265 â€ Nikolov, Arkheologiia V.4 (1963), pp. 41-2
